pull.title: refactor: Drop boost::this_thread::interruption_point and boost::thread_interrupted in main thread
pull.body: This PR drops useless `boost::this_thread::interruption_point` and `boost::thread_interrupted` catch. They are only executed in main thread.

events.message: refactor: Drop boost::this_thread::interruption_point and boost::thread_interrupted in main thread

events.body: Tested ACK b7df96f4565064bcb7cbbf7e2507e03bdcf339f0 (checked that all calls and interceptions have no runtime effects)
